name: Momentum
author: Gary Erskine

sections.description:
Momentum is a simple plugin to repost any page with new content appended daily.

Momentum allows you improve search engine ranking with a few tricks.

Improved Search Engine Ranking

Everyday Momentum will download a news snipit and save it locally for fast access

Any page that has the shortcode will be updated everyday automatically

The Sitemap will be submitted to Google and Bing everyday

http://buyswopsell.co.nz

=Links=

https://www.cloudinternetsolutions.co.za/momentum

http://www.skinart.co.za

http://www.seagle.co.za

http://www.trafficcop.org

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/electronics-video-games-consoles-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/boats-watercraft-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/electronics-audio-music-equipment-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/electronics-computers-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/electronics-tv-dvd-equipment/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/events-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/fashion-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/free-classified-adverts-for-services/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/jobs-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/property-classifieds/

http://buyswopsell.co.nz/classifieds/sports-leisure-classifieds/

=Simple instructions=
After installing and activating the plugin
Add the short code [addm2p url=””] in your home page were you want it and update the page.
View the page to check you are happy!!!

=Who needs this Plugin=
Every Website owner
A lot of websites are just for business presence and are very rarely changed. Search engines have complex algorythms but they are focused on new content.
By doing a daily page update will help a page do better in Search engine listings.

=Required Plugins=
This plugin assumes you have a plugin too keep your sitemap.xml file uptodate.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the momentum folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the momentum plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. copy the ShortCode [addm2p url=””] into the homepage, normally at the bottom.
sections.faq:
Does the plugin make coffee?

How to find help?

First, look here.

Else Please contact the author.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 CNN Rss feed added

1.0.0 All bugs Fixed
